author: akarasulu
msg: old props not needed anymore - all compiles fine under 1.4

author: akarasulu
msg: o Added CharsetUtils and weak test case for it
o Removed dependencies on JDK 1.5 API's:
- IllegalArgumentException( String, Throwable ) (used logger with exception)
o Added excludes to tests for DatagramBindTest and VmPipeTrafficControlTest.
These tests are prone to a timing related bug in JDK 1.5 which is due to
file descriptor cleanup issues which need garbage collection. Until a work
around is implemented we will ignore these tests.

author: damitha
msg: Added dir handler code and test cases for it. Also made changes in Makefile.am's

author: bayard
msg: Now I'm onto a machine that does the right thing charset-wise, I'm committing the generated docs with the ApacheCon logo removed and the CVS/SVN link changed to Subversion
